mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs_info(bbs_title, bbs_content, bbs_teacher_seq, bbs_class_seq) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{teacherNo}, #{classNo});
mapper.select: select count(*) from bbs_info where bbs_title like '%${keyword}%'

select a.*, b.teacher_name as authorName from ( select bbs_seq as no, bbs_category as category, bbs_title as title, bbs_regdt as regDt, bbs_content as contents, bbs_teacher_seq as authorNo, LAG(bbs_seq) over (order by bbs_seq) as prevNo, LAG(bbs_title) over (order by bbs_seq) as prevTitle, LEAD(bbs_seq) over (order by bbs_seq) as nextNo, LEAD(bbs_title) over (order by bbs_seq) as nextTitle from bbs_info ) a inner join teacher_info b on a.authorNo = b.teacher_seq where no = #{bbsNo}
select bfile_name as fileName, SUBSTRING_INDEX(bfile_name, '.', -1) as fileType, CONCAT('/file/bbs/', bfile_name) as downloadURL from bbs_info_file where bfile_bbs_seq = #{bbsNo}
